List of all CRAN events (new, updated, archived packages)

Source: R/crandb-public-api.R, R/print.R
cran_events.Rd

List of all CRAN events (new, updated, archived packages)

cran_events(releases = TRUE, archivals = TRUE, limit = 10, from = 1)

# S3 method for cran_event_list
summary(object, ...)

# S3 method for cran_event_list
print(x, ...)

Arguments

releases

Whether to include package releases.
archivals

Whether to include package archivals.
limit

Number of events to list.
from

Where to start the list, for pagination.
object

Object to summarize.
...

Additional arguments are ignored currently.
x

Object to print.

Value

List of events.

Examples

cran_events()

#> CRAN events (events)-----------------------------------------------------------
#>  . When     Package    Version Title                                           
#>  - 1 hour   sigora     3.0.5   Signature Overrepresentation Analysis           
#>  - 1 hour   SoupX      1.5.0   Single Cell mRNA Soup eXterminator              
#>  - 1 hour   DealGPL570 0.2.0   Dealing GPL570 RAW.tar file                     
#>  + 5 hours  DescTools  0.99.41 Tools for Descriptive Statistics                
#>  + 5 hours  RxODE      1.0.8   Facilities for Simulating from ODE-Based Mode...
#>  + 5 hours  disaggR    0.2.0.2 Two-Steps Benchmarks for Time Series Disaggre...
#>  + 5 hours  noaaoceans 0.3.0   Collect Ocean Data from NOAA                    
#>  + 10 hours ClimInd    0.1-3   Climate Indices                                 
#>  + 10 hours RBF        2.1.0   Robust Backfitting                              
#>  + 10 hours hawkesbow  1.0.2   Estimation of Hawkes Processes from Binned Ob...
cran_events(limit = 5, releases = FALSE)

#> CRAN events (archivals)--------------------------------------------------------
#>  . When   Package    Version Title                                             
#>  - 1 hour sigora     3.0.5   Signature Overrepresentation Analysis             
#>  - 1 hour SoupX      1.5.0   Single Cell mRNA Soup eXterminator                
#>  - 1 hour DealGPL570 0.2.0   Dealing GPL570 RAW.tar file                       
#>  - 2 day  sclero     0.2     Measure Growth Patterns and Align Sampling Spot...
#>  - 2 day  SunsVoc    0.1.1   Constructing Suns-Voc from Outdoor Time-Series ...
cran_events(limit = 5, archivals = FALSE)

#> CRAN events (pkgreleases)------------------------------------------------------
#>  . When     Package    Version Title                                           
#>  + 5 hours  DescTools  0.99.41 Tools for Descriptive Statistics                
#>  + 5 hours  RxODE      1.0.8   Facilities for Simulating from ODE-Based Mode...
#>  + 5 hours  disaggR    0.2.0.2 Two-Steps Benchmarks for Time Series Disaggre...
#>  + 5 hours  noaaoceans 0.3.0   Collect Ocean Data from NOAA                    
#>  + 10 hours ClimInd    0.1-3   Climate Indices                                 
summary(cran_events(limit = 10))

#> CRAN events (events)
#>  [1] "sigora@3.0.5-"     "SoupX@1.5.0-"      "DealGPL570@0.2.0-"
#>  [4] "DescTools@0.99.41" "RxODE@1.0.8"       "disaggR@0.2.0.2"  
#>  [7] "noaaoceans@0.3.0"  "ClimInd@0.1-3"     "RBF@2.1.0"        
#> [10] "hawkesbow@1.0.2"
